channel.title: Runescape Riot February 1st
channel.description:
P2P RIOT!!!!!
I'm starting a riot in Runescape, Their Staff SUCKS. I got banned today for the second time, second account. Both times bogus.
[QUOTE]Heres the reason why i got banned, its not important though. I will get half posts asking how i got banned, so here. Old Account: Level 100 110m on it: "Macroing"? New Account: Level 55 DT done, 73 mage, 73 range 44 pray 70m: Asked my friend for my password for a school thing, got banned. [/QUOTE] The riot is not about how i got banned, but how they need to get the workers to work. the system sucks, and seeing how the riots worked for ss, this should work too. Jagex needs to wake up.
[COLOR=Red][U]World:[/U] [/COLOR][B]13[/B] [COLOR=Purple][U]When:[/U][/COLOR] [B]February 1st; 12PM Pacific[/B] [COLOR=Blue][U]Where:[/U][/COLOR] [B]Varrock[/B]
Repost This Everywhere

item.description:
@system wrote:

Go cry somewhere else,

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Riot February 1st
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

jme_009:

I think his point was that he probably was macroing even though he said he didn’t. He probably just got banned and then threw a temper tamtrum and tried denying anything he might have done wrong.

I don’t think that’s what he said. Either way, why would he deny it to us? It’s not like the fate of his account is in our hands. And anyway, its more likely that Fuckex made the mistake, because they do that all the time.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Riot February 1st
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:11, topic:51449”][quote author=uncfan1119 link=topic=72179.msg822248#msg822248 date=1169790230]
The rs macro system doesn’t make many mistakes. It finds the noobies like you who seem to not know how to auto correctly. Its harder for the system to find real macros. Send in an appeal. Like 6 months or something after you are perm banned you get a “Last Chance Appeal”.
[/quote]

Learn how to read.[/quote]
I think his point was that he probably was macroing even though he said he didn’t. He probably just got banned and then threw a temper tamtrum and tried denying anything he might have done wrong.

Read full topic

You go girl![/quote]

/care

item.title: Runescape Riot February 1st
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

/mute ThatOneServer
“Riot” is over. Do you honestly think you’ll be making a difference? There is a 99% chance they wont even notice you, and if they do they will just laugh at you.

But seriously, sounds like an angry nerd fest. Maybe if you actually do something rather then bitch and moan then you’ll find yourself in a better position. They are pretty strict on the rules, so you need to follow them the best you can because there seems to be very little tolerance or exceptions, but that is a good thing imo.

Read full topic

item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

I support this. When you get blackmarked or banned on a main, you’ll feel his pain. I think Jagex customer support is for shit. Fuck them.
